subject: Cooking
title: Catherine de Medici Didn't Bring French Cuisine
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: Catherine de Medici Didn't Bring French Cuisine.

hook.text: A popular legend claims Catherine de Medici brought Italian chefs to France in 1533, creating French cuisine.

buildup.text: The story says she arrived with pastry chefs, saucemakers, and techniques that transformed French cooking.

discovery.text: French culinary historians have debunked this â€” French cooking was already sophisticated before Catherine's arrival.

twist.text: The myth was invented by 19th-century Italian nationalists to claim credit for French culinary achievements.

climax.text: French cuisine evolved from medieval traditions, local ingredients, and its own innovations â€” not an Italian transplant.

punchline.text: French cuisine is French. The Italian origin story is just national pride.

quiz.question: Who actually created the myth that Catherine de Medici invented French cuisine?
